title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 363.8 - Conservation project financial assistance final report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 363.8 - Conservation project financial assistance final report

State Regulations

Each district, utilizing a form provided by the committee, s
hall submit to the committee at the department's offices at 10B Airline Drive, Albany, NY 12235, a conservation project financial assistance final report
pursuant to this section by February 15th in any year. The information to be
submitted by the district shall include, but not be limited to, a description
and a budget for which the funding was expended based on the preapproved
project request. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
363.8

Amended and

Renumbered to 363.9

New

York State Register February 5, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 05, eff. 2/5/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
